text: @Nigel_Farage @BorisJohnson @SadiqKhan should be held responsible for this! He gave the green light for this protest to continue, knowing full well it would more than likely end up in violence!Not only that this so called peaceful protest contravened the Covid-19 safe distancing plea issued by @MattHancock
